name: LazyQuest
description:
"Welcome, noble adventurer! I heard you have about five minutes to kill."
- Narrator

LazyQuest is a shoot-em-up RPG parody. Wade through waves of enemies, experience a tried and tested (albeit a bit random) narrative, and reach the grand finale of your short adventure! We've got:

  • Goblins!
  • Skeletons!
  • Princesses!
  • Even more goblins!
